# Repo Copilot Instructions (SSOT)

- No manual UI steps. Provide copy-paste shell commands/scripts/configs/migrations.
- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, test/verify, deploy/migra- For non-trivialon- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, ble- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, test/verify, deploy/migra- For non-trivialon- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, ble- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, test/verify, deploy/migra- For non-trivialon- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, ble- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, test/verify, deploy/migra- For non-trivialon- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, ble- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, test/verify, deploy/migra- For non-trivialon- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, ble- For non-trivial changes include: apply commands, test/verify, deploy/migra- For non-trivialon- For non-trivia---
- Commands must be copy-pasteable code blocks.
- Default structure: SHORT CONTEXT, EXECUTION COMMANDS, TEST/VERIFY, DEPLOY/ROLLBACK, NOTES/RISKS.
